name: Certified nurse aides; investigations of abuse and neglect Assistance and Child Welfare Services
text:
The department shall adopt rules pursuant to chapter 91 relating to:
     (1)  The investigation of:
         (A)  Abuse or neglect by a certified nurse aide working in a health care setting licensed or certified by the department; and
         (B)  Misappropriation of an individual's property by a certified nurse aide working in a health care setting licensed or certified by the department; and
     (2)  Action taken against a certified nurse aide as a result of an investigation pursuant to paragraph (1). [L 2007, c 226, pt of §3]
